answers.answer: Have you had a blood glucose tolerance test or your thyroid checked?

Yes. Like everyone complaing about heaviness or discomfort on chest, all the test came back negative. My doctor tested me for diabetes, thyroid, kidney and liver functions.The condition gets worse when I eat eggs. I do experience this even though I do not eat eggs or food containing eggs. My doctor suggested doing sleep study, but my insurance will not cover the test and I am not sure that is the case. It does not happen everyday. My doctor is not extremely concerned about this, but it is a big concern for me. I do not think this is normal. I am not sure whether I am allerugic to other foods and/or some things accumulate in my system.

question: After eating, I experience tiredness, slower or faster heart rate, lower blood pressure and light headness. I often feel like I need to lie down or sit down. I can do any normal factions, but I just do not feel good at all. My doctors cannot figure out the cause. I am allerugic to eggs. After I eat eggs, this symptoms happens. Laterly, it is happening more even though I do not eat any eggs.Does anyone have any idea?
title: fatigue
